ygData.subject: Re: Let the battle begin!
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia pressed the Predicon symbol on his chest, the loading ramp opened once again. Kluster ran off before Phobia could show him what he brought him yhere

Phobia pressed the Predicon symbol on his chest, the loading ramp 
opened once again. Kluster ran off before Phobia could show him what 
he brought him yhere for. Oh well he could still show Hysteria 
(Kluster ordered her along so I'm guessing she's there.)
"Come with me my sweet" (If she follows) He leads her to a series of 
transport crates and turns toward a control on the wall, "Computer 
open crates in hold B major."

The crates opened on one side exposing the contents, "These are 
Predacon Decimator Rifles, Intended for use if we found any hostiles 
on Mettallicis. These are just some of the things the scavengers that 
found my ship let me take with me."

(If Hysteria didn't follow then)
Phobia turns and places a handfull of Babies on the ground outside 
his ship, "This is a message for Kluster" He hoped that the Predicons 
wouldn't find the message."You left before I could show my 
appreciation for your assistance. If our technologies are compatible 
I may be able to provide you with the resources you need to repair 
your ship. To respond just tell my baby to send a response. Its 
sending parameters are offline until it hears that command. Phobia 
out." the babies turn and scamper back towards the cybertronian fire. 
He sent multiple babies carrying the same message, at least one 
should find it's mark.

He set another handfull down,"Message for Predicons, This is Phobia 
to Predicon teams, I wish to join your ranks and meet with your 
leaders. I need a promise of protection. I have something you will 
want as trade for amnesty." That group was intended for the Predicon 
attackers, set to the signatures he detected. the babies turned and 
headed back to the battlefield.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster reaches Phobia's ship, stopping. "Here you are. If you'd 
exuse me, I 
> need to join the battle."
> 
> He runs toward the Cybertronian Fire, grinning as he passes the 
charred 
> Mosquitor, an example of the raw power of his ship.
